action.description: The action to be performed in the default service accounts. Valid values are: DEPRIVILEGE, DELETE, DISABLE. Note that DEPRIVILEGE action will ignore the REVERT configuration in the restore_policy.

project.description: The project ID where service accounts are created.

restore_policy.description: The action to be performed in the default service accounts on the resource destroy. Valid values are NONE, REVERT and REVERT_AND_IGNORE_FAILURE. It is applied for any action but in the DEPRIVILEGE.

service_accounts.description: The Service Accounts changed by this resource. It is used for revert the action on the destroy.
